name: Soul Wishes
description:
Starting as a Global Game Jam project, this simple-to-understand (but difficult-to-master) music game reads the music data from.wav, .mp3, and .aug files of any song and creates a custom and repeatable challenge.

The original song was written, recorded, and mixed during during the Global Game Jam weekend featuring Dual Wield Software and friends. A full EP is being worked on.

Key Features
  • A procedural rhythm game
  • Play to your own music
  • Supports .wav, .mp3, and .aug file types
  • Multiple difficulty modes
  • Contains one free goofball anime-inspired song
Credits
